config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code retrieves the user stylesheet URI specified in the TranscodingHints. It first checks if the URI is present in the hints, and if so, returns it. If not found, it falls back to the superclass method to get the user stylesheet URI.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getUserStyleSheetURI method is called in the code. The frequency of triggering depends on how often this method is invoked in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the USER_STYLESHEET_URI configuration option is related to the customization of the user stylesheet used in transcoding. If a custom stylesheet URI is provided, it will affect the appearance and layout of the transcoded content. If not specified, the default behavior defined in the superclass method will be used.
